Posts.Title: 5 weeks post prostatectomy psa

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by mike_connecticut His main compliant is that he is dizzy most of the time. You may want to take a look at the medications he is taking. Any recent change in meds? As an example, I was taking Actos, a diabetic med, for over two years with no problems. Then I started experiencing vertigo and dizziness. Through process of elimination, the doctor and I traced my problem to the Actos. The Vertigo and dizziness went away after I stopped using it.
